data.job_description:
Duration: 2-3 months

Will need to get NIH badge- takes 5-6 weeks to get.
• * Must be a United States Citizen or Green Card Holder.**
• IF they already have an NIH Badge or NIH Security Clearance, they will move to the top of the list. *

What You'll Do
• Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps
• Execute all visual design and implementation stages from concept to design to build
• Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design
• Synthesize the information learned, and, when appropriate, create Personas that are used to represent different types of users that interact with the integrated application
• Create interactive Prototypes
• Participate in requirements sessions with business stakeholders and end users of the integrated application
• Conduct user research in the form of interviews, focus groups, surveys, usability testing, and analysis of data
• Lead UX-related meetings and collaborate closely with Product Owners, Business Analysts, and Pega Developers

Required Knowledge And Skills
• Bachelor’s degree in a related field of study (design, interaction design, or computer science)
• Minimum of 5 years of professional experience with React.js
• Experience in Agile development
• Advanced knowledge of wireframing and/or prototyping
• Experience with JavaScript frameworks (jQuery, jQuery Mobile, React.js, etc.)
• Excellent communication skills and analytical skills
• Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills required
• Public Trust security clearable

Abilities
• Well-organized and self-directed individual; ability to balance and prioritize competing requirements
• Ability to work collaboratively as part of a larger, integrated team
• Ability to creatively problem-solve
• Ability to build strong trust-based working relationships with team and clients

Nice to Haves
• Experience with MS DevOps tools preferred
• Experience using human centered design or design thinking a plus

Qualifications: Must be a United States Citizen or Green Card Holder.**
IF they already have an NIH Badge or NIH Security Clearance, they will move to the top of the list
Bachelor’s degree in a related field of study (design, interaction design, or computer science)
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience with React.js
Experience in Agile development
Advanced knowledge of wireframing and/or prototyping
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (jQuery, jQuery Mobile, React.js, etc.)
Excellent communication skills and analytical skills
Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal skills required
Public Trust security clearable
Well-organized and self-directed individual; ability to balance and prioritize competing requirements
Ability to work collaboratively as part of a larger, integrated team
Ability to creatively problem-solve
Ability to build strong trust-based working relationships with team and clients
Nice to Haves

Execute all visual design and implementation stages from concept to design to build
Conceptualize original ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex design
Synthesize the information learned, and, when appropriate, create Personas that are used to represent different types of users that interact with the integrated application

data.job_title: React Developer for Frontend Development - Contract to Hire

Qualifications: Proven experience as a React Developer with a strong portfolio;
Solid understanding of React.js and its core principles;
Experience with state management libraries (e.g., Redux);
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling;
Responsibilities: 1 Collaborate with the design team to implement user interfaces;
2 Develop modular and reusable components using React.js;
3 Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications;
4 Work closely with backend developers to integrate frontend components;
5 Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in React.js development;
Benefits: We are open to negotiating a competitive hourly rate

data.job_description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

This Jobot Job is hosted by Dan Dungy

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $90,000 - $110,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We're a very large privately held bank.

Why join us?

We have a great culture on our team and we're building exciting products in our industry.

Job Details

Job Details

We are seeking a talented and experienced React Developer to join our dynamic team. This is a fantastic opportunity to contribute to the development of our innovative banking solutions that are transforming the industry. The successful candidate will be responsible for creating and implementing visually appealing, user-friendly interfaces that will enhance our customers’ experience. As a React Developer, you will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and upgrade our mortgage systems. The role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, challenging environment and has a passion for technology and its ability to drive efficiency and effectiveness.

Responsibilities
• Develop new user-facing features using React Native.
• Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
• Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers.
• Collaborate with the product team to design innovative solutions to meet market needs.
• Work closely with back-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
• Participate in code reviews to maintain a high-quality code base.
• Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
• Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software.
• Create security and data protection settings.

Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
• 3+ years of experience in React Native and other popular frameworks.
• Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
• Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles.
• Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux).
• Knowledge of .NET and MVC frameworks.
• Proficiency in TypeScript.
• Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools.
• Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements.
• A knack for benchmarking and optimization.
• Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git, SVN, and Mercurial.
• Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a team player.
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Qualifications: The role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, challenging environment and has a passion for technology and its ability to drive efficiency and effectiveness

3+ years of experience in React Native and other popular frameworks

data.job_title: Skilled React Developer Needed for Creating an Engaging 'Coming Soon' Landing Page
data.job_description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced React developer to create a captivating 'Coming Soon' landing page for our innovative application. This page will play a crucial role in building anticipation and engaging early users before the official launch.

Key Responsibilities:

Design and develop a responsive 'Coming Soon' landing page using React.

Implement a design that highlights key features of our upcoming app.

Ensure the landing page is optimized for various devices and screen sizes.

Integrate email sign-up functionality to capture early interest.

Collaborate closely with our team to align the landing page with our brand's visual and messaging guidelines.

Key Requirements:

Proven experience in React development with a portfolio of live projects.

Strong understanding of front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React.

Experience in creating responsive web designs and working with cross-browser compatibility.

Excellent communication skills and a good team player.

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Desirable Skills:

Experience with SEO optimization.

Knowledge of UI/UX best practices.

Familiarity with email marketing tools and integrations.

Project Scope:

The project is expected to commence immediately upon selection of the right candidate.

We estimate the project duration to be 3 days , subject to review as the work progresses.

Application Instructions:

Please submit your application with a portfolio showcasing relevant React projects, especially any 'Coming Soon' or similar pages you've developed. Also, include a brief outline of how you approach designing and developing landing pages.

We look forward to seeing your application and potentially welcoming you aboard our exciting project!

Qualifications: Proven experience in React development with a portfolio of live projects
Strong understanding of front-end technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React
Experience in creating responsive web designs and working with cross-browser compatibility
Excellent communication skills and a good team player
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
Experience with SEO optimization
Knowledge of UI/UX best practices
Familiarity with email marketing tools and integrations
Responsibilities: This page will play a crucial role in building anticipation and engaging early users before the official launch
Design and develop a responsive 'Coming Soon' landing page using React
Implement a design that highlights key features of our upcoming app
Ensure the landing page is optimized for various devices and screen sizes
Integrate email sign-up functionality to capture early interest
Collaborate closely with our team to align the landing page with our brand's visual and messaging guidelines
Also, include a brief outline of how you approach designing and developing landing pages

data.job_description:
Leverate is a vibrant Hi-Tech Company specializing in the B2B financial services industry and located in Ramat Gan.

Description

We are looking for a highly skilled lead Developer to collaborate with a team of developers and UX designers to develop and maintain a web application. The ideal candidate possesses strong communication skills and is able to develop reusable, efficient, and scalable code.
Requirements

Requirements:

Must:
• At least 4 years of experience working as a developer.
• In-depth knowledge of Sass, CSS, HTML.
• Experience with user interface design.
• Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest.
• Knowledge of React tools including Webpack, Redux, and Flux.
• Proficient in using Git as a control system.

Advantage :
• Experience working with MongoDB and NodeJS.
• Knowledge and experience with React Native.
• Knowledge and proven working with Cloud services environment ( Azure / AWS / GCP )
• Experience working with one of the following technologies: Redis, Elasticsearch. #J-18808-Ljbffr

Qualifications: At least 4 years of experience working as a developer
In-depth knowledge of Sass, CSS, HTML
Experience with user interface design
Knowledge of performance testing frameworks including Mocha and Jest
Knowledge of React tools including Webpack, Redux, and Flux
Proficient in using Git as a control system
Experience working with MongoDB and NodeJS
Knowledge and experience with React Native
Knowledge and proven working with Cloud services environment ( Azure / AWS / GCP )
Experience working with one of the following technologies: Redis, Elasticsearch
